name: grizzling
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
grizzle
(especially of a young child) to cry continuously but not very loudly, or to complain all the time: The baby was cutting a tooth and grizzled all day long. They're always grizzling (= complaining) about how nobody invites them anywhere.
